permissions: Allowed when the user can destroy the parent retainer. Retainer periods delegate destroy permission to the retainer policy: admins are allowed; broker retainers allow broker members of the buyer organization; customer retainers allow broker members of the seller organization or customer members of the buyer organization.
validation_notes: Requires the retainer period ID argument and the --confirm flag. Deletion is blocked unless the retainer is editing; otherwise it errors with a retainer status message.
